snippet: Guards fired live ammunition to break up a fight today between gangs of black and Hispanic inmates in the yard of a maximum-security prison.    One inmate was killed but the cause was not clear. Thirteen were injured, five critically....
lead_paragraph: Guards fired live ammunition to break up a fight today between gangs of black and Hispanic inmates in the yard of a maximum-security prison. One inmate was killed but the cause was not clear. Thirteen were injured, five critically.
abstract: Guards at Sacramento state prison in California fire live ammunition to break up fight between gangs of black and Hispanic inmates (S)
